content: houndstooth cowl a quick and colorful knit for holiday gifting construction knit bottom-up in the round on a 16 circular needle ease and fit pattern is written in one size knitters can alter the size by using bigger or smaller needles or using thinner or bulkier yarn materials blue sky fibers woolstok worsted weight 100% non-superwash wool mc 1 skein in midnight sea cc 1 mini-skein bundle in holiday frost cowl as pictured used 25 yards each of 4 colors this is about 2 mini skeins for each color used you will have extra mini skeins at the end for use in a second cowl as the bundle comes with 3 mini skeins each of 7 colors you could also make a 2-color cowl with 1 skein each of two contrasting colors gauge size 5 and 6 needles approx gauge is 21 stitches and 26 row to 4 inches finished circumference is 23 finished height is 9 abbreviations bor beginning of round mc main color cc contrast color 1 pattern instructions using size 5 needles and your main color cast on 120 stitches place bor marker and join to work in the round long tail cast on and german twisted cast on both work well work 5 row of k2/p2 ribbing change to size 6 needles and knit 1 row even work from the chart cycling through your contrast colors in whatever sequence you like working 1 repeat of each color in turn the 4-stitch chart is repeated 30 times around the 120 stitches of your cowl work your cowl as deep as you want understanding that going beyond 12 repeats of the chart will require more of your main color you would have enough in your mini skeins for a deeper cowl if desired after 12 repeats 48 row of the chart switch back to your size 5 needles and work 1 row even in your main color continuing in mc on size 5 needles work 5 row in k2/p2 ribbing bind ox in pattern bury all ends and wet or steam block to finish houndstooth cowl chart 2
